RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 75. Claiming Purse 13500. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES IN 2022 - 2023. Weight, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since March 26, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ROCK ON COWBOY grabbed command early, set a pressured pace off the inside, was under a hustling ride battling inside foes into the lane, edged away slightly past the three sixteenths, braced for an outside challenge from MIND ON MY MONEY leaving the furlong grounds, lost the lead soon past the sixteenth pole, battled back under solid handling and got the bob at the wire. MIND ON MY MONEY rated back off rivals around the first turn, settled off the contested pace while in the clear, edge closer four wide leaving the far turn, circled five to six wide into the lane, closed in under right handed asks, gained a slim advantage outside ROCK ON COWBOY inside the sixteenth marker, dueled nose to nose and just missed in a game effort. BAND BOSS , four wide early, tracked outside a rival, shifted out some, around the final turn, bid four wide between runners nearing the stretch but couldn't quite go with the top pair through final furlong. SOCIAL AFLEET , in close at the break, settled off the pace, raced between foes into the far turn, shifted out with pursuit into the lane and churned on. MY BOOK , three wide pressing outside the winner, was under urging battling between rivals into the lane then faded. FLIT N FLOT TIME saved ground off the early pace, moved up some nearing the half, angled out around the final turn, chased into the lane then gave way. SOURNOIS dropped in soon after the start and secured the rail, tracked under rating, came under a ride leaving the three eighths, failed to kick on approaching the stretch and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Rock On Cowboy
ENTRY.COMMENT: pace 2w,outside pressure,headed 1/16,resurgent,got bob,driving

ENTRY.NAME: Social Afleet
ENTRY.COMMENT: in close start, settled, between 3-1/2, shifted out upper, mildly

ENTRY.NAME: Flit N Flot Time
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, edged up some 1/2, angled 5/16, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Sournois
ENTRY.COMMENT: dropped in early, tracked inside, pushed along 5/16, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Mind On My Money
ENTRY.COMMENT: rate off foes,in clear,circled 5w,bid 1/8,dueled,led,lost bob

ENTRY.NAME: My Book
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3wd pressing outside winner, between into lane, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Band Boss
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4wd into first turn,tracked outside foe,4wd bid between,outfinish

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 2 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 60. Claiming Purse 13000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ARMS APRIORITY drifted in at the break, corrected and was hustled up to the inside rivals and put a head in front after a furlong, set a rated pace towards the rail, kicked away after being set down soon into the stretch, kept on under steady handling through the final furlong and held sway. ASHLEY'S GIRL , wide and off the early pace, circled five to six wide advancing into the lane, continued progress outside rivals heading to mid stretch, lugged in and switched over to her left lead nearing mid stretch but kept on well to gain. KATIE'S C , off the pace and removed from the rail, angled out and brushed with DECORATED LADY when working between foes near the three sixteenths, chased the top pair from there but flattened out in the final sixteenth. HOT PATOOTIE forced the early pace three wide between rivals, remained between runners pursuing into the lane, stayed willingly to about mid stretch then gave way. THIRSTYPROSPECT saved ground with pursuit, failed to kick on under asking past the five sixteenths and retreated. LOYAL TO THE CHIEF had speed and contested the early pace outside the winner, gave chase to the inside of rivals nearing the lane, failed to go on and dropped back. DECORATED LADY , four deep prompting the early pace, chased wide around the turn, steadied when brushed and put in tight by KATIE'S C soon into the lane then gave way. PER RULING DATED 7/26/23 RECIEVED FROM THE LOUISIANA RACING COMMISSION (RULING # 25403), ARMS APRIORITY WAS DQ'D DUE TO A POSITIVE TEST.

ENTRY.NAME: dq-Arms Apriority
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled up,rate inside,ask upper,spurt away,held sway,driving

ENTRY.NAME: Thirstyprospect
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, hustled along mid turn, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Loyal to the Chief
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed, pressed outside winner, inside foes 1/4, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Hot Patootie
ENTRY.COMMENT: forced early pace 3wd between, between foes upper, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Decorated Lady
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4-deep nearing 1/2, chased turn, steadied, brushed 3/16, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Katie's C
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace,off inside,angled,brushed foe 3/16,run between,flattened

ENTRY.NAME: Ashley's Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: wide off pace,circled 5-6w,rally outside foes,lugged in,left lead

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 63. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TALK TO TOKEY , keen to go three deep into the first turn, moved clear heading to the backstretch, dropped in a bit and set the pace, held firm when confronted by three foes to his outside entering the far turn, emerged in a tussle with BELLO CREEDO past the three eighths, spurted away from that one when roused and drifting three wide into the lane, was corrected with right handed asks, powered away in mid stretch, switched over to his left lead a sixteenth later then maintained a comfortable advantage while kept alert. FORGED IN STEEL , three wide into the first turn, settled back off the early pace, rolled up to challenge four deep into the far turn, could not quite initially quicken with the dueling leaders past the three eighths, kept on grinding though and came back on to be clear for the place. WHEELS TURNING , fidgety in the gate, broke in the air, lagged well back, gathered some momentum off the rail mid way on the final turn, circled six wide into the stretch and churned on. BELLO CREEDO vied between runners into and around the first turn, was wrangled back off the winner nearing the three quarter pole, came back to bid two wide between rivals into the far turn, sparred outside the winner to about the quarter pole, stayed on to mid stretch then gave way. TUCKER THE GRUMP had speed inside rivals, rated back then angled out to stalk, moved up and bid three wide between horses into the far turn, could not go with the leading duo past the three eighths, chased to mid stretch then faded. UNBRIDLED PULPIT saved ground, made some progress leaving the three eighths, lacked a punch into the lane and weakened. MOSH PIT , between rivals, gave way. WILDCARD GOLD saved ground into the backstretch and failed to respond.

ENTRY.NAME: Tucker the Grump
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed inside foes,rate back,rebid 3wd between,pressed,weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Wildcard Gold
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground into backstretch, failed to respond

ENTRY.NAME: Bello Creedo
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed between,wrangled back,rebid between 3-1/2,dueled,fade

ENTRY.NAME: Unbridled Pulpit
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, mild move nearing 1/4 pole, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Mosh Pit
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, between horses far turn, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Forged in Steel
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3wd nearing 7/8,bid 4-deep far turn, chased, kept on, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Wheels Turning
ENTRY.COMMENT: fidgety in gate,broke in air,lagged,circled 6wd,mild rally

ENTRY.NAME: Talk to Tokey
ENTRY.COMMENT: keen 3-deep 7/8ths,cleared,met bids 3-1/2,duel,widen,driving

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 4 1M Turf CR: 66. Claiming Purse 19000. FOR FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD OR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000, For Each $2,500 To $15,000 2 lbs. (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MS. CAJUN QUEEN rated forwardly and saved ground off the duel leaving the far turn, eased out and bid three deep approaching the stretch, kicked clear after being roused soon into the lane, was kept alert with a right handed ask near the furlong grounds, switched over to her left lead with about a sixteenth to go then held firm under a steady hand ride. ABSOLUTELY settled off the pace, advanced while saving ground leaving the three eighths, came out for the drive, moved up between rivals in mid stretch and kept on gamely to earn the place. PLANTS AND BIRDS rated off the inside early on, took closer order to the inside of a foe mid way on the final turn, shifted out four wide for the drive, gained outside runners in mid stretch then hung a bit late while out kicked for second. RIPTIDE ROSE disputed the pace outside a rival, held a slim lead nearing the quarter pole, raced between foes soon after, failed to go on leaving mid stretch and faded. PSEUDOSCIENCE drafted back off the pace while saving ground, was under asking in upper stretch, eased out and had some belated interest. CALIFORNIA CALI broke outward, stalked outside, came four wide under urging into the stretch and weakened. AVENDORE lagged back off the pace, came wide for the drive and failed to menace. SWIZZLECITY , wide and off the early pace, edged up four wide nearing the half mile marker, chased around the final turn then retreated through the lane. MISS G G set a pressured pace towards the inside, dueled from the far turn to the quarter pole and weakened. SARATOGA PASODOBLE , fractious in the gate, reared at the start and lost her rider. There was a stewards' inquiry into the start of SARATOGA PASODOBLE. No action was deemed necessary.

ENTRY.NAME: Pseudoscience
ENTRY.COMMENT: drafted back off pace, saved ground, eased out 1/8, belatedly

ENTRY.NAME: Miss G G
ENTRY.OWNER: Guidry MD George Gary Guidry Ruth Delahoussaye Eddie and Delahoussaye Juanita
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressured pace inside, dueled far turn to 1/4, weakened 3/16

ENTRY.NAME: Ms. Cajun Queen
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated fowardly,eased out 5/16,bid 3-deep 1/4,cleared,ridden out

ENTRY.NAME: Absolutely
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off pace,inside move 5/16,angled,run between,gain 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Saratoga Pasodoble
ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious in gate, reared, lost jockey

ENTRY.NAME: Riptide Rose
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 2wd outside foe, slim lead 5/16, weakened final furlong

ENTRY.NAME: Plants and Birds
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated off inside,edged up inside foe 3/8,angled 4wd,move,hung

ENTRY.NAME: California Cali
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke outward, stalked outside, 4wd upper stretch, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Avendore
ENTRY.COMMENT: lagged back, wide upper stretch, failed to menace

ENTRY.NAME: Swizzlecity
ENTRY.COMMENT: wide off early pace, 4wd move past 5/8ths, chase to 1/4, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 91. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 18000. FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $10,000. Weight, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since March 26, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Such A Race Since February 26, 2 023 Allowed 5 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Claiming Races For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BAYOU JAM rated back from between rivals leaving the gate, settled well back off the early pace, commenced a wide run leaving the far turn, circled four wide into the stretch, drifted in a bit past the three sixteenths then leveled off nicely when put to left handed encouragement, surged past a pair of foes leaving the sixteenth marker and drew clear. OAK HILL LG , five wide into the first turn, edged up four wide into the far turn, bid three wide outside leader mid way on the final turn, forced the issue into the stretch, saw the leader kick clear in mid stretch, came back on between rivals with a sixteenth to go and kept on willingly to gain the place. G VICTORY took over early and set the pace towards the inside, took pressure around the final turn, spurted back clear under a drive in mid stretch, wandered outward and weakened late. JAZZY JUSTIN , a bit keyed up and pulling behind rivals while saving ground into the backstretch, eased back off a runner near the half mile marker, shifted out to pursue and kept grinding through the lane. CRIMSON STORM prompted the early pace outside the leader, chased into the clear near the three eighths and gave way. NATE'S REVENGE lagged far back, was four wide under a ride nearing the quarter pole, angled wider for the drive and had a mild response. SERMONONTHEMOUNT saved ground and came up empty. MISCHIEF'S MACHINE , three wide stalking the early pace, offered a mild two wide bid into the far turn, was under a hearty ride trying to keep pace past the three eighths and weakened. MUFFIN NUTS rated behind rivals near the five eighths, lacked a kick under asking leaving the far turn and gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Nate's Revenge
ENTRY.COMMENT: lagged far back, 4wd under ride 3/8ths, angled 6wd, mildly

ENTRY.NAME: Jazzy Justin
ENTRY.COMMENT: pulled early iniside, eased back near 1/2, shifted out, churned

ENTRY.NAME: Bayou Jam
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated back,well back,4wd advance 1/4,level off 1/8,drove clear

ENTRY.NAME: G Victory
ENTRY.COMMENT: pace towards inside, pressured 3/8, clear 1/8, drift late, weaken

ENTRY.NAME: Crimson Storm
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted 2wd early, chased in clear 3/8 pole, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Muffin Nuts
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked behind rivals leaving 3/4, dropped back 2nd turn

ENTRY.NAME: Sermononthemount
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, saved ground under ride 1/4 pole, empty

ENTRY.NAME: Mischief's Machine
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3wd stalking pace, bid far turn, hard urged 3/8 pole, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Oak Hill Lg
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5wd 7/8,edged up 4wd 1/2,bid 3wd,pressed,between 1/16,willing

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 6 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 71. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MATH MAN rated along between rivals, steadily advanced between foes into then leaving the far turn, bid four wide outside ITELLYOUTHEFACTS approaching the stretch, wrested command soon after and pulled away through the final furlong while kept to a drive. ITELLYOUTHEFACTS got a into a duel outside rival soon after the break, carried that battle to the three eighths, shook clear then was engaged with a quarter to go, saw the winner get away in mid stretch but dug in nicely to hold down the place. VALIANT DEFENDER , six wide and well off the early pace, gained six wide outside rivals nearing the quarter pole, loomed in upper stretch but flattened out late. GENERAL EISENHOWER had speed inside and got involved in a pace scrum into the first turn, dueled through the backstretch and into the far turn, ceded the lead three furlongs out, kept on willingly to upper stretch then gave way. DA GOLD ROOM saved ground, angled four wide making some headway past the five sixteenths but failed to seriously kick on through the drive. CARRIES MAN stalked the dueling leaders three wide, was under pressure past the three eighths and lacked a solid stretch run. BAQUERO'S BIND saved ground and weakened. HOPE FOR CHANGE , three to four wide, gave way. TED STRIKER lost ground four wide, was under a hustling ride into the far turn and weakened. XIETELEHUAS , four wide early, dropped in and retreated.

ENTRY.NAME: Baquero's Bind
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: General Eisenhower
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed, extended duel inside, headed 3/8ths, weakened last 1/8th

ENTRY.NAME: Math Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: rate between,steady move 3/8,4w bid 1/4,drew away,driving

ENTRY.NAME: Itellyouthefacts
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 2wd outside foe,clear 5/16,met bid 1/4,held well

ENTRY.NAME: Da Gold Room
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, angled 4wd past 5/16ths, chased, empty

ENTRY.NAME: Carries Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked duel 3wd, between horses nearing lane, needed bid

ENTRY.NAME: Hope for Change
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3wd early, 4wd between horses 3/8 pole, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Valiant Defender
ENTRY.COMMENT: 6wd off pace, 6wd move 1/4 pole, flattened out late stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Ted Striker
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4wd nearing 1/2, hustled along 3/8 pole, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Xietelehuas
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4wd early, angled in, dropped back

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 71. Allowance Purse 35000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since March 26, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Such A Race Since February 26, 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. (Maiden And Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DANCE LIL DARLING settled off the rail, moved up and bid four deep around the far turn, emerged widest in a three way battle approaching the stretch, wandered outward a bit then was soon corrected with a right handed ask in upper stretch, edged clear near mid stretch, kept on under right handed encouragement inside the sixteenth marker then held sway. STRAWBERRY SUNDAE stalked about three wide, edged up and bid three wide between foes nearing the three furlong marker, battled between runners into the stretch, saw the winner get away some in mid stretch but gamely dug back in and cut into the margin inside that one in the final yards. WORLD OF HURT , off the pace while removed from the rail, circled four wide into the stretch and closed steadily. DIXIE FARMER steadied off the leader's heels into the first turn, was a touch rank then settled, moved up and bid two wide between horses leaving the far turn, dueled inside a pair of runners from the three eighths to upper stretch, stayed willingly to mid stretch then gave way. R T'S GEM saved ground, angled out near the five sixteenths and faded. WHO DAT GINGER drew clear early, set the pace towards the rail, was engaged by a trio leaving the far turn, gave little resistance and faltered. ENTITLEMENT saved ground, faltered nearing the lane and was eased.

ENTRY.NAME: R T's Gem
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, angled 4wd past 5/16ths, shifted back in, fade

ENTRY.NAME: Dixie Farmer
ENTRY.COMMENT: steadied off heels early,bid 2wd between,vied inside foes,weaken

ENTRY.NAME: Who Dat Ginger
ENTRY.OWNER: 3EJ Racing Stable LLC and Reeves Cathy
ENTRY.COMMENT: drew clear early, pace inside, swarmed over 3/8ths, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Entitlement
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, faltered, eased

ENTRY.NAME: Strawberry Sundae
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace,3wd bid between 3/8,dueled,game inside winner

ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off rail,bid 4-deep near 3/8,duel,drift 1/4,driving

ENTRY.NAME: World of Hurt
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, off inside, circled 4wd into stretch, steady rally

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 8 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 41. Maiden Claiming Purse 12000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SING THE NOTES broke inward, was corrected and settled off the embattled duo past the five eighths, picked up steam five then four wide leaving the far turn, continued wide progress into the lane, kept on grinding under left handed asks inside the sixteenth marker, gained a slim advantage in deep stretch then prevailed between runners. SHOTGUN ANNIE drafted well back early on, was under a ride four wide mid turn, leveled off inside the three sixteenths, shifted out wider in the final furlong and closed in to nab the place. ZONG WAVE flashed speed then was rated back off the leaders in the opening furlong, moved up four then three wide departing the far turn, advanced with the winner into the stretch, worked between rivals and kept on gamely to the line. SABERFIGHT had speed outside four rivals then emerged in a duel outside DREAMED I AM FAST heading to half mile marker, took over around the turn then cleared in hand approaching the quarter pole, drifted in when put to pressure soon into the lane, clung to the lead past mid stretch, was joined by foes nearing the sixteenth marker and gave way grudgingly. DREAMED I AM FAST had speed between runners then dueled to the inside of SABERFIGHT, failed to match strides with that one nearing the lane, came off the inside with pursuit past mid stretch and kept on with effort to the wire. GRACE'S SOLDIER forced the early pace between rivals and gave way. BEAT THE DOUBLE flashed speed, chased three wide past the half mile marker, failed to keep pace soon after and retreated. BITSY'S DOUBLE DAY was sent up to the inside of runners early on, vied briefly, faltered around the turn and was eased in the lane.

ENTRY.NAME: Bitsy's Double Day
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent up inside, vied briefly, faltered, eased

ENTRY.NAME: Grace's Soldier
ENTRY.COMMENT: forced early pace between horses, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Beat the Double
ENTRY.OWNER: Sebastian J Ronald and Sebastian Linda P
ENTRY.COMMENT: flashed speed, 3wd nearing 1/2 pole, dropped back

ENTRY.NAME: Dreamed I Am Fast
ENTRY.OWNER: Bruno Jr Gerald Deville Carl J and Our Blue Streaks Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed between,duel inside foe,angled out past 1/8,trying

ENTRY.NAME: Saberfight
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed outside foes,duel into turn,clear 1/4,drift in,grudgingly

ENTRY.NAME: Zong Wave
ENTRY.COMMENT: flashed speed,rate back,4-3wd,move up 1/4,bid between,gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Shotgun Annie
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled well back, urged 4wd turn, shifted out 1/8, gaining

ENTRY.NAME: Sing the Notes
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke inward,off early duel,4w move,grind,up late,driving between
